experiences.title: Intern
detail1: Acted as a bridge of communication between the engineering team, the design team, and the warehouse operators
Created JIRA tickets for the engineers and designers
Wrote a user guide teaching new warehouse operators how to use the newer version
Wrote documentation for various delivery services (freight, bulky, normal, etc.)
Completed several product roadmaps to organize past, present and future projects
detail2: Designed a website consisting of both the API documentation as well as a section to guide bigger clients on how to create a sandbox testing account independently
Worked on a project to improve the interface design of a delivery app (Ninja Easy) used by smaller clients to deliver parcels to their customers

Worked on a project to migrate warehouse operators to the newer version of a zonal routing software: conducted user research (interviews & contextual inquiries) for both versions of this software and ran usability testing on the warehouse operators for the newer version
detail3: Coded basic mock-ups for the first project under â€œUX Research and Design

experiences.title: Research Intern
experiences.details: Researched and analysed ways to increase connectivity between people and their environment through interactions between big data and sensors to promote efficiency, productivity, and better end-user experiences

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Human Centered Design and Engineering
